companies.name: CyberGlove Systems
companies.description: CyberGlove Systems is the worldwide leader in data glove technology, offering sophisticated hand-centric 3D motion capture solutions. Their products enable detailed capture of finger, hand, and arm movements for applications in virtual reality, industrial engineering, academic research, and simulation, featuring both kinesthetic force and vibrotactile feedback.
